@description.name: @description
@description.body: Decorator which uses the CSS3 border image properties.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Adds the border-image styles to the given map

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Computes the inset values based on the border image slices (defined in the decoration theme or computed from the fallback image sizes).

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Map} Map with the top, right, bottom and left insets
@return.description: Map with the top, right, bottom and left insets

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the slice sizes from the fallback border images.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: baseImage {String} Resource Id of the base border image
@param.description: Resource Id of the base border image

@return.name: @return
@return.body: {Integer[]} Array with the top, right, bottom and left slice widths
@return.description: Array with the top, right, bottom and left slice widths

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property borderImage. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #borderImage}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property borderImage. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #borderImage}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property borderImage. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #borderImage}.
